document_data.mainbody:
aver was an adventurer of the early-to-midâ€“8 century DR.
He was an old warrior.
He was described as bluff, brawling, and guffawing.
He rode a horse.
He was the leader of a band of seven adventurers known as Tavers Talons, who were known as heroes in Buckralams Starn.
In the band of adventurers he led, one of his people was the father of a certain Immeira.
Tavers band used to ride across Buckralams Starn, until around  when all seven members perished in the jaws of a dragon. Their bones were largely unidentifiable and indistinguishable after their deaths.
Two years after their deaths, the men of the Iron Fox, a bandit, came to town and spread rumors of secret evil deeds committed by Tavers Talons. They convinced people in the Starn that the Talons had been fiends in human form out to corrupt women of passing caravans and spread their dark seed. Other rumors were that the Talons came to scout on behalf of a bandit kingdom further away, called Talontar or Darkride.
